TextView.android:text: During the New Kingdom the god Amun gained enough recognition that he was combined with Ra to create Amun-Ra. This became the most important national god throughout the New Kingdom. He became known as the king of the gods. As he became more well-known monotheism began to erupt. Amun-Ra is the most widely recorded of the Egyptian gods. He was also worshiped outside of Egypt in Libya and Nubia.
